mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.master_id AS "masterId", a.order_type AS "orderType", a.order_number AS "orderNumber", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.major_sort AS "majorSort",
a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.suggest_finish_time AS "suggestFinishTime", a.service_hour AS "serviceHour", a.service_status AS "serviceStatus",
a.pay_price AS "payPrice", a.order_address_id AS "orderAddressId", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.service_time AS "serviceTime", a.finish_time AS "finishTime", a.order_status AS "orderStatus", a.order_source AS "orderSource", a.pay_status AS "payStatus", a.customer_id AS "customerId", a.customer_remark AS "customerRemark", a.customer_remark_pic AS "customerRemarkPic", a.business_name AS "businessName", a.business_phone AS "businessPhone", a.business_remark AS "businessRemark", a.business_remark_pic AS "businessRemarkPic", a.shop_name AS "shopName", a.shop_phone AS "shopPhone", a.shop_addr AS "shopAddr", a.shop_remark AS "shopRemark", a.shop_remark_pic AS "shopRemarkPic", a.order_remark AS "orderRemark", a.order_remark_pic AS "orderRemarkPic", a.order_content AS "orderContent", a.cancel_reason AS "cancelReason", a.joint_order_id AS "jointOrderId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO order_info( id, master_id, order_type, order_number, org_id, station_id, major_sort,
longitude, latitude, suggest_finish_time, service_hour, service_status, origin_price, pay_price, order_address_id, order_time, service_time, finish_time, order_status, order_source, pay_status, customer_id, customer_remark, customer_remark_pic, business_name, business_phone, business_remark, business_remark_pic, shop_id, shop_name, shop_phone, shop_addr, shop_remark, shop_remark_pic, eshop_code, order_remark, order_remark_pic, order_content, cancel_reason, joint_order_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{masterId}, #{orderType}, #{orderNumber}, #{orgId}, #{stationId}, #{majorSort},
#{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{suggestFinishTime}, #{serviceHour}, #{serviceStatus}, #{originPrice}, #{payPrice}, #{orderAddressId}, #{orderTime}, #{serviceTime}, #{finishTime}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderSource}, #{payStatus}, #{customerId}, #{customerRemark}, #{customerRemarkPic}, #{businessName}, #{businessPhone}, #{businessRemark}, #{businessRemarkPic}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{shopPhone}, #{shopAddr}, #{shopRemark}, #{shopRemarkPic}, #{eshopCode}, #{orderRemark}, #{orderRemarkPic}, #{orderContent}, #{cancelReason}, #{jointOrderId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE order_info SET master_id = #{masterId}, order_type = #{orderType}, order_number = #{orderNumber}, org_id = #{orgId}, station_id = #{stationId}, major_sort = #{majorSort},
longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, suggest_finish_time = #{suggestFinishTime}, service_hour = #{serviceHour}, service_status = #{serviceStatus}, origin_price = #{originPrice}, pay_price = #{payPrice}, order_address_id = #{orderAddressId}, order_time = #{orderTime}, service_time = #{serviceTime}, finish_time = #{finishTime}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, order_source = #{orderSource}, pay_status = #{payStatus}, customer_id = #{customerId}, customer_remark = #{customerRemark}, customer_remark_pic = #{customerRemarkPic}, business_name = #{businessName}, business_phone = #{businessPhone}, business_remark = #{businessRemark}, business_remark_pic = #{businessRemarkPic}, shop_name = #{shopName}, shop_phone = #{shopPhone}, shop_addr = #{shopAddr}, shop_remark = #{shopRemark}, shop_remark_pic = #{shopRemarkPic}, order_remark = #{orderRemark}, order_remark_pic = #{orderRemarkPic}, order_content = #{orderContent}, joint_order_id = #{jointOrderId}, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE order_info SET
order_status = #{orderStatus},
service_status= #{serviceStatus},
finish_time= #{finishTime},
real_service_time= #{realServiceTime},
update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id} AND service_status != 'finish'
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name" FROM basic_organization a
a.del_flag = '0'
${sqlMap.dsf}
ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT a.id AS id, a.tech_id AS techId, b.name AS techName, b.head_pic AS headPic, b.sex AS techSex, b.phone AS techPhone FROM order_dispatch a LEFT JOIN tech_info b ON a.tech_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{id} AND a.status = 'yes' AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}

SELECT a.id AS id, a.tech_id AS techId, b.name AS techName, b.head_pic AS headPic, b.sex AS techSex, b.phone AS techPhone FROM order_dispatch a LEFT JOIN tech_info b ON a.tech_id = b.id AND b.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE a.order_id = #{id} AND b.id = #{dispatchTechId} AND a.status = 'yes' AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}

SELECT a.service_time AS "serviceTime", good.sort_id AS "sortId", good.item_id AS "itemId", good.item_name AS "itemName", good.goods_id AS "goodsId", good.goods_name AS "goodsName", good.goods_num AS "goodsNum", good.goods_unit AS "goodsUnit", good.pay_price AS "payPrice", good2.convert_hours AS "convertHours", good2.start_per_num AS "startPerNum", good2.capping_per_num AS "cappingPerNum" FROM order_info a LEFT JOIN order_goods good ON a.id = good.order_id AND good.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} LEFT JOIN ser_item_info_goods good2 ON good.goods_id = good2.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT b.picture AS "pictures" FROM order_goods a LEFT JOIN ser_item_info b ON a.item_id=b.id AND b.del_flag = '0' WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT a.item_id AS "itemId", b.sort_id AS "sortId", b.name AS "itemName", a.id AS "goodsId", a.name AS "goodsName", a.price AS "payPrice", a.type AS "goodsType", a.unit AS "goodsUnit", a.min_purchase AS "minPurchase" FROM ser_item_info_goods a LEFT JOIN ser_item_info b ON a.item_id = b.id AND b.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE a.item_id = #{itemId} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_info SET business_name = #{businessName}, business_phone = #{businessPhone}, business_remark = #{businessRemark}, business_remark_pic = #{businessRemarkPic}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE order_info SET shop_name = #{shopName}, shop_phone = #{shopPhone}, shop_remark = #{shopRemark}, shop_remark_pic = #{shopRemarkPic}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT og.goods_id AS goodsId from order_info a LEFT JOIN order_goods og on a.id=og.order_id AND og.del_flag = '0' where a.id= #{id} AND a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT a.id AS techId, a.name AS techName, a.phone AS techPhone FROM tech_info a WHERE a.id in
#{techId}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_info SET service_status = #{serviceStatus}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, cancel_reason_remark = #{cancelReasonRemark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.tech_id AS "techId", a.week AS "week", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime" FROM tech_work_time a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.week = #{week} AND a.tech_id in
#{techId}

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.tech_id AS "techId", a.schedule_date AS "scheduleDate", a.schedule_week AS "scheduleWeek", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.type_id AS "typeId", a.type AS "type", a.remark AS "remark" FROM tech_schedule a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.type=#{type} AND a.tech_id in
#{techId}
